title: Newchanka
author: Newchanka
content: Hi everyone, I'm searching for a good plagiarism and paraphrasing software that I can pay for with crypto. Please let me know if you know of any. Thanks.

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: Quote from: Newchanka on June 01, 2023, 07:58:16 AMHi everyone, I'm searching for a good plagiarism and paraphrasing software that I can pay for with crypto. Please let me know if you know of any. Thanks.Just to clarify what you are actually looking for - software that needs to detect that some content is plagiarized/paraphrased, or software that creates such content? I don't offer any of that, I'm just interested in what exactly you're looking for, because there are a lot of free detectors online that do the job pretty good.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: Lucius on June 02, 2023, 02:53:41 PMQuote from: Newchanka on June 01, 2023, 07:58:16 AMHi everyone, I'm searching for a good plagiarism and paraphrasing software that I can pay for with crypto. Please let me know if you know of any. Thanks.Just to clarify what you are actually looking for - software that needs to detect that some content is plagiarized/paraphrased, or software that creates such content? I don't offer any of that, I'm just interested in what exactly you're looking for, because there are a lot of free detectors online that do the job pretty good.I think he is trying to find out a software that can take someone else's work and paraphrase it in a way that the detectors won't find it anymore as a plagiarized content. He's searching for an illegal thing and that's not allowed in our forum. I recommend the OP to stop searching for such software that misuse the hard work of another writer.A writer has to research and learn the topics and the stuff before writing good content and such thing requires really hard work and devotion. I don't think that it's a fair thing to paraphrase the work of a writer to make it undetected by plagiarism detectors. That's one of the worst crimes and is totally against copyrights of the owner.

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Quote from: SamReomo on June 02, 2023, 03:09:18 PMI think he is trying to find out a software that can take someone else's work and paraphrase it in a way that the detectors won't find it anymore as a plagiarized content.Yep, that's how I understood his post as well.What troubles me here is that he is actually advertising article writing services so it looks like he is looking for a way to cheat his future clients. Anyway, I'll give him a chance to clear this out (in case he didn't express himself correctly) before I leave him negative tag. Quote from: Newchanka on March 29, 2023, 10:21:34 AMHi everyone, I can help boost your casino and gaming business through my article writing service. I have done this for a few years and understand exactly what your audience needs are. So whether you want to create more awareness for your business or know what the competition is doing to get ahead, I can use my initiative to customize a content campaign for you. Contact me here or on Telegram @Cyberczar

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: Rikafip on June 02, 2023, 04:47:04 PMQuote from: SamReomo on June 02, 2023, 03:09:18 PMI think he is trying to find out a software that can take someone else's work and paraphrase it in a way that the detectors won't find it anymore as a plagiarized content.Yep, that's how I understood his post as well.What troubles me here is that he is actually advertising article writing services so it looks like he is looking for a way to cheat his future clients. Anyway, I'll give him a chance to clear this out (in case he didn't express himself correctly) before I leave him negative tag. Quote from: Newchanka on March 29, 2023, 10:21:34 AMHi everyone, I can help boost your casino and gaming business through my article writing service. I have done this for a few years and understand exactly what your audience needs are. So whether you want to create more awareness for your business or know what the competition is doing to get ahead, I can use my initiative to customize a content campaign for you. Contact me here or on Telegram @CyberczarThree things he will use the software to cheat his client, he will use the software to correct his own writing to make it unique or he will do both, online writers that offer their service needs tools to correct their entries Grammarly and similar tools and plagiarism software was created to help writers and bloggers on their presentation, but the same tool can be used to cheat their client, I need not question his intention as long as he can deliver what his client needs and he will not use this here in Bitcointalk.

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Quote from: coin-investor on June 02, 2023, 10:06:49 PMGrammarly and similar tools and plagiarism software was created to help writers and bloggers on their presentation, but the same tool can be used to cheat their clientCare to expplan how exactly can "plagiarism software" help writers with their presentation, other than witing that article for them? Keep in mind that he didn't ask for software that can help him polsih the article like Grammarly is doing, but he is asking specifically for plagiarism and paraphrasing software and those two are very different things. Quote from: coin-investor on June 02, 2023, 10:06:49 PM I need not question his intention as long as he can deliver what his client needs and he will not use this here in Bitcointalk. I am pretty sure that their clients don't need plagiarized content which can only get them into trouble and since he is advertising his writing services on bitcointalk, you don't think that he would use it for his clients here as well?

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: Rikafip on June 03, 2023, 09:21:45 AMQuote from: coin-investor on June 02, 2023, 10:06:49 PMGrammarly and similar tools and plagiarism software was created to help writers and bloggers on their presentation, but the same tool can be used to cheat their clientCare to expplan how exactly can "plagiarism software" help writers with their presentation, other than witing that article for them? I am pretty sure that their clients don't need plagiarized content which can only get them into trouble and since he is advertising his writing services on bitcointalk, you don't think that he would use it for his clients here as well?Â  Yes of course do check this website and its purpose its long been established that a plagiarism checker is a tool to help teachers, professionals, and students with their presentation to make sure that they are going to come out with a unique content.https://www.quetext.com/plagiarism-checker

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Quote from: coin-investor on June 03, 2023, 03:21:50 PMYes of course do check this website and its purpose its long been established that a plagiarism checker is a tool to help teachers, professionals, and students with their presentation to make sure that they are going to come out with a unique content.I know that plagiarism checker tools can be useful (my wife is a teacher and often use them and I also tried them in the past looking forward plagiarism on forum) but OP is not asking about that but instead for plagiarism and paraphrasing software and those are very different things.Unless he actually meant plagriasim checker but then again what kind of writer is he if he can't express himself properly.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: Rikafip on June 03, 2023, 08:05:40 PMQuote from: coin-investor on June 03, 2023, 03:21:50 PMYes of course do check this website and its purpose its long been established that a plagiarism checker is a tool to help teachers, professionals, and students with their presentation to make sure that they are going to come out with a unique content.I know that plagiarism checker tools can be useful (my wife is a teacher and often use them and I also tried them in the past looking forward plagiarism on forum) but OP is not asking about that but instead for plagiarism and paraphrasing software and those are very different things.Unless he actually meant plagriasim checker but then again what kind of writer is he if he can't express himself properly. I think it's for OP to answer this if the link I provided is similar to what he is looking for, the plagiarism checker and software have similar functionalities and that is to check or trace if the articles or a written work are unique and it calculates the percentage of uniqueness.And for your info as provided by the image I provided teachers, writers, and students already use plagiarism checker to make sure that their work is unique because they may have accidentally copied some people's works, it's not a cheating tool it is created to make sure that your work passed the criteria in terms of uniqueness.I hope you get my point so let's leave it to OP to address where he will use these tools.

comments.author: Newchanka
comments.body: Quote from: coin-investor on June 03, 2023, 08:46:15 PMQuote from: Rikafip on June 03, 2023, 08:05:40 PMQuote from: coin-investor on June 03, 2023, 03:21:50 PMYes of course do check this website and its purpose its long been established that a plagiarism checker is a tool to help teachers, professionals, and students with their presentation to make sure that they are going to come out with a unique content.I know that plagiarism checker tools can be useful (my wife is a teacher and often use them and I also tried them in the past looking forward plagiarism on forum) but OP is not asking about that but instead for plagiarism and paraphrasing software and those are very different things.Unless he actually meant plagriasim checker but then again what kind of writer is he if he can't express himself properly. I think it's for OP to answer this if the link I provided is similar to what he is looking for, the plagiarism checker and software have similar functionalities and that is to check or trace if the articles or a written work are unique and it calculates the percentage of uniqueness.And for your info as provided by the image I provided teachers, writers, and students already use plagiarism checker to make sure that their work is unique because they may have accidentally copied some people's works, it's not a cheating tool it is created to make sure that your work passed the criteria in terms of uniqueness.I hope you get my point so let's leave it to OP to address where he will use these tools.Thanks @Coin-Investor. It's really amusing that people jump into conclusion about issues that they know nothing about. How would anyone conclude that an article rewriting software automatically implies it's used for cheating? The funny fellow is even threatening a red tag in their ignorance. By the way, as a writer, I can decide to reproduce my written work in different forms. for instance, the article I wrote for my blog could be adapted for voiceover in my podcast or video. The rephrasing software would do that just fine. Also, if I feel that the quality of work submitted by a writer I hire isn't unique enough, I can also use a paraphrasing tool to improve it. I hope its clear enough to you, Rikafip, the red tagger.

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Quote from: Newchanka on June 05, 2023, 10:02:05 PMIt's really amusing that people jump into conclusion about issues that they know nothing about.Maybe you should try to express yourself better so people won't have to guess and assume. You are supposed to be a writer after all.
